Articles.Content:
Good afternoon to all!

Does anybody know, whether there' any mods, that contain parts like pistons and rotating joints (similar to ones in Infernal Robotics), but not powered/controlled - just free-moving under influence of gravity/other parts pushing (in other words - is it possible to build something like crankshaft with pistons)?

Best regards and good day to all!
You might wish to look at that: http://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/97042-WIP-Internal-Combustion-Engine-Construction-Kit-77-Industries
Thank you, this one looks just like I wanted.
